Reviews.Title: Good enough for the price...
Reviews.Author: Sergio Segovia
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet expecting very little of it, but it works as well as any other with the exception of screen quality, the screen quality is a little weak but if you need this to check e-mails, and occasional surfing with WIFI, this is pretty good. It is fast enough to keep you browsing with interest and it has a wide range of applications available through the android market. I would give it a 4 if it had a little better camera. The tactile sensitivity is not too accurate compared to other tablets but you can get used to its demands.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Jessi
Reviews.Content: I know this isn't a fancy expensive tablet, but you'd think it would last more than a week before the screen stops working.  I have exchanged it, but probably will not be using it very much.

Reviews.Title: AVOID !!
Reviews.Author: Esther C Terry
Reviews.Content: Had it for 6 days when the on button stopped working. Cant turn it on! Total waste of money. Paid $60 Brand new - Should of know it was too good to be true.  I guess you get what you pay for!!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: T. J. Brown
Reviews.Content: product did not perform like expected return to Polaroid they had to send a new one locked up just have to be careful with it

Reviews.Title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
Reviews.Author: dolores sandoval
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THIS FOR MY GRANDSON, BOUGHT HIM A SD CARD , TABLET WELL NOT READ IT, TOOK IT BACK TOTOYS R US AND THEY HAD NO MORE TABLETS AND COULD NOT MAKE IT WORK, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS TABLET

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time/money
Reviews.Author: kim kucher
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet during cyber Monday sales at Toys R Us(including the extended warranty) as a Christmas gift. Opened it Christmas day, followed the instructions for charging it (8hrs) then when I powered it up, a portion of the touch screen was non responsive. Emailed Southern Telecom on the 26th and called every day (on hold 1/2 hr each time) and did not speak to a rep until January 10. I explained my situation, and was told to take a photo of the unit and email it to them! I went back to Toys R Us, but they could not exchange it due to time lapse. When I called the warranty dept., I was told they COULD NOT exchange or repair the unit, only refund my money (minus the cost of the warranty!) Why sell a warranty that cannot replace/repair the unit???I have since received an email telling me to reset to factory settings. Perhaps my downloaded apps caused a crash? Are you kidding, I was unable to so much as register the tablet due to a non functioning screen!!! Well, I reset it and now the screen does not respond at all! I emailed them on Jan. 15th, and have heard nothing back. I called the # today, and they are updating their phone system. The worst customer service ever!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual Cameras
1GHZ Processor
capacty Display
Wi-fi
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid V7 7" Internet Tablet Front & Rear Camera Android 4.1 Jelly Bean Tablet
